content: HIT-RE 500 V3 Epoxy anchor Ultimate-performance injectable epoxy mortar with approvals for rebar connections and heavy-duty anchoring ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features High performance and technical superiority as per international approvals Suitable for diamond-cored holes – when prepared using the TE-YRT roughening tool Injectable epoxy suitable for all-year use – cures at temperatures down to -5°C / 23°F Longer working time – allows greater flexibility during installation Suitable for water-filled holes and underwater applications (depending on rod specification and approvals) Applications Structural connections with post-installed rebar (e.g. extension/connection to walls, slabs, stairs, columns, foundations, etc.) Structural renovation of buildings, bridges and other civil structures, retrofitting and re-strengthening of concrete members possible Anchoring structural steel connections (e.g. steel columns, beams, etc.) Fastenings requiring seismic qualification Fastening in natural stone and wood, including GLT and CLT made by spruce, pine or fir. For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) Approvals / Test reports: Fire, ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic IBC compliance: IBC 2015, IBC 2018 Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Submerged, Water-filled, Wet | Approvals / Test reports | Fire, ICC-ES report (concrete), Seismic | IBC compliance | IBC 2015, IBC 2018 | Seismic loading | Yes | PROFIS Software | Yes | Anchoring elements | HIS-N internally threaded sleeves, HIT-V threaded rods, Rebar | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 158 °F | Type of fixing (global) | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 2123401 - Epoxy adh RE 500-V3 11.1oz/330ml - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: -
